books.title: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
books.description: The first novel in the Harry Potter series. It follows Harry Potter, a young wizard who discovers his magical heritage on his eleventh birthday.

A dystopian social science fiction novel and cautionary tale. Thematically, it centres on the consequences of totalitarianism, mass surveillance, and repressive regimentation of persons and behaviours within society.

books.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
books.description: A novel by Harper Lee published in 1960. It is widely read in American schools. The plot and characters are loosely based on Lee's observations of her family, her neighbors and an event that occurred near her hometown in 1936.

books.title: The Shining
books.description: A horror novel by Stephen King. The story centres on the Torrance family: father Jack, mother Wendy, and their young son Danny as they settle into the isolated Overlook Hotel for the winter.

books.title: Tôi Thấy Hoa Vàng Trên Cỏ Xanh
books.description: Một tiểu thuyết dành cho thanh thiếu niên của nhà văn Nguyễn Nhật Ánh. Câu chuyện xoay quanh hai anh em Thiều và Tường cùng những kỷ niệm tuổi thơ ở làng quê Việt Nam.

books.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
books.description: The second novel in the Harry Potter series. The plot follows Harry's second year at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

books.title: Animal Farm
books.description: An allegorical novella reflecting events leading up to the Russian Revolution of 1917 and then on into the Stalinist era of the Soviet Union.

books.title: The Da Vinci Code
books.description: A mystery thriller novel that follows symbologist Robert Langdon and cryptologist Sophie Neveu after a murder in the Louvre Museum in Paris.

books.title: The Lord of the Rings
books.description: An epic high-fantasy novel written by English author and scholar J. R. R. Tolkien.

books.title: Murder on the Orient Express
books.description: A detective novel by English writer Agatha Christie featuring the Belgian detective Hercule Poirot.
